---
title: Statistics for sagepoint-node validator
date: As of `r Sys.time()` 
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE)

library(ggplot2)

rd <- read.csv("/home/bosr/R_HOME/sagepoint.csv")
rd$Rewards <- rd$Rewards / 1e9

rewards <- ggplot(rd, aes(Rewards, Time, group = 1)) + 
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Outstanding Rewards in TCRO")

height <- ggplot(rd, aes(Height, Time, group = 1)) + 
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Block Height")

power <- ggplot(rd, aes(Power, Time, group = 1)) + 
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Voting Power")
```

```{r}
print(rewards)

print(height)

print(power)

```
